project.title: My portfolio v2
project.text_presentation: This portfolio aims to bring together all the projects that are close to my heart and that I want to share. It was designed entirely by me.
project.text_roadmap_1: I started to imagine this portfolio after my 3rd year internship in which I was a front-end developer for 5 months. At the end of this internship, I felt the need to have a site that suited me more. Since the creation of my first portfolio a year and a half ago, my design and development skills have evolved. He was no longer representative of my tastes and abilities. It was the ideal project to use my new skills.
project.text_roadmap_2: Regarding the design a lot of ideas came to me. Shared between several design inspirations, I wanted something simple, aesthetic and modern. Using the figma, I was able to quickly create my models and imagine my animations.
project.text_roadmap_3: This project was an opportunity to deepen my skills in web development. Indeed, I chose to use vue.js to create my portfolio. A framework that I knew very little about at the start of this project. I also, unlike my first portfolio, wanted to add animations and transitions done in css.
project.quote: My portfolio is the best way to share my universe and my creations.
project.text_conclusion_1: I am proud and satisfied with the work I have done. My portfolio is more in my image and allows me to showcase my work. It was with real pleasure that I imagined and made it alone.

project.title: My travel diary
project.quote: This blog allows me to unite my passion for the web and travel in a single project.

project.title: Space game
project.text_presentation: Space game is a 3D game where the objective is to reach the finish line with as many points as possible.
project.quote: Handling 3D renderings allowed me to get out of my comfort zone.
